article_title: IDF says senior Hamas commander killed in Israeli air strike
sentence: IDF  says  senior  Hamas  commander  killed  in  Israeli  air  strike  T-I-T-L-E-E-N-D.

article_title: IDF says senior Hamas commander killed in Israeli air strike
sentence: The  Israeli  military  says  senior  Hamas  commander  Rafa  Salama  was  killed  in  an  air  strike  in  Gaza  on  Saturday.

article_title: IDF says senior Hamas commander killed in Israeli air strike
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  said  that  Israel's  strike  hit  a  camp  for  displaced  people  in  a  designated  humanitarian  zone  in  Khan  Younis,  killing  at  least  90  Palestinians  and  injuring  289  others.
